column1: Pneumococcal vaccine can help protect you from serious infections due to the pneumococcal bacteria.
These infections include: - In the blood (bacteremia) - Of the covering of the brain (meningitis) - In the lungs (pneumonia) You need at least one shot.
Pregnant women cannot receive the nasal vaccine.
The hepatitis B vaccine helps protect you from getting a liver infection due to the hepatitis B virus.
